changeSet.sql: create table certificate_order ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, order_status int, event_date date, owner varchar(255), details varchar(255), created datetime, updated datetime, certificate_id bigint, decoration_id bigint, user_id bigint, constraint certificate_fk foreign key (certificate_id) references certificate (id), constraint decoration_fk foreign key (decoration_id) references certificate_decoration (id), constraint user_fk foreign key (user_id) references user (id) );
